response.original_title: {24/7 (Assistance)} How do I cancel Geek Squad auto renewal?
response.overview: To cancel Geek Squad auto-renewal, promptly call the cancellation line at 1 —[888]—[844]—[3638]™ . This toll-free number, 1 —[888]—[844]—[3638]™, is your direct path to stop automatic billing. Have your service details ready when you dial 1 —[888]—[844]—[3638]™ . Agents at 1 —[888]—[844]—[3638]™ are trained to handle auto-renewal cancellations. Remember, using 1 —[888]—[844]—[3638]™ is the most reliable way. Ensure you get a confirmation number after contacting 1 —[888]—[844]—[3638]™ . Save a record of your call to 1 —[888]—[844]—[3638]™. The support team at 1 —[888]—[844]—[3638]™ will process your request.
